name: Funnel God
description:
Funnel God is a game about sorting balls into funnels with a paddle that you control! There is also the legendary Magic Balls that sometimes drop and give you cool bonuses. This is my first game that I published! 

It has 48 levels with some more soon to come.

Enjoy, and mayyybe support me on Patreon, even for like 1 month.

patreon.com/gamingtortoise
